name: Saturn gone MAD!!!
description:
This my first game ever made! It is very simple, just shoot some enemies that goes through the screen. You have limited lifes and takes damage whenever an enemy escapes alive.

Each kill gives you points and headshots gives you more points.

All text is in portuguese but it is not that important.

And obsviously the art assets are sprites from Earthbound and Mother 3, all rights goes to Nintendo.

Commands: Use mouse to aim and left button to shoot.

Just extract and execute base.exe. The game might take some seconds to load, just wait (even if it seems it crashed).
